scripts.start: nodemon -r dotenv/config --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("./alias-loader.mjs", pathToFileURL("./"));' index.js
scripts.dev: nodemon -r dotenv/config --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("./alias-loader.mjs", pathToFileURL("./"));' index.js
